sections.heading: One switch does one thing (press and release)
sections.body: Gain attention to indicate to others that you have something to say. This can prompt them to get your paper-based communication system.

sections.heading: What you'll need
sections.body:
Record a message onto a BIGMack talking switch such as "I have something to say, please get my communication book".

Plug one of my switches into the BIGMack and position my switch so I can use it.
